question: Which of the following is not a financial statement?
Statement of retained earnings is also known as?
_____ and _____ are competing goals for the finance manager.
Officer appointed by court or govt. under statute may conduct?
To determine the liquidity position of the firm ___ analysis will be undertaken?
Evaluation is done for several years simultaneously at a time for making conclusions is called?
The figures shown in financial statements are converted to percentages so as to establish each element to the total figures of the statement are called?
Which of the following is a limitation of financial statements?
options: Provide information about performance of an enterprise
The net income disclosed by the P&L a/c is not absolute but only relative
answer: The net income disclosed by the P&L a/c is not absolute but only relative

question: Financial statement analysis means?
options: Study of relationship among various factors in a business as disclosed by financial statements
Study of investment and accounting policies of the enterprise
answer: Study of relationship among various factors in a business as disclosed by financial statements
